messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Every good Hiker gets a boost of
energy when surrounded by boulders!Wrooooar! Coming at you!
Let me blow off some steam!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Whew... Crazy, delicious sugar!
I think I’ve calmed down now...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
If it’s called a mountain, you can
be sure I’ll be climbing it.Even if it’s a mountain of food, I’ll
still be stickin’ my flag on top!
